parameters.name: $src_VehicleData$
parameters.label: src_VehicleData
parameters.customQuery:
With Vehicle_STG AS
(select distinct 
A.name,A.id,A.serial,A.vin,A.make,A.model,A.licensePlate
from 
[IntegrationsDEV].[dbo].[Samsara_Vehicles_Data_STG] A
where A.name like '%JEFFTRK%'),
Vehicle_Tag_STG AS
(select distinct 
A.name,D.id as Tag_ID,D.name as Tag_Name
from 
[IntegrationsDEV].[dbo].[Samsara_Vehicles_Data_STG] A
left join [IntegrationsDEV].[dbo].[Samsara_Vehicles_Attributes_STG] B on A.Base_Seq=B.Base_Seq and A.PK_data=B.[FK_data]
left join [IntegrationsDEV].[dbo].[Samsara_Vehicles_StringValues_STG] C on A.Base_Seq=C.Base_Seq and C.FK_attributes=B.PK_attributes
left join [IntegrationsDEV].[dbo].[Samsara_Vehicles_Tags_STG] D on A.Base_Seq=D.Base_Seq and D.FK_data=A.PK_data),
Tag_STG AS
(SELECT distinct 
       [id] as Tag_ID
      ,[name] as Tag_name
  FROM [IntegrationsDEV].[dbo].[Samsara_Tags_Data_STG])
SELECT A.REC_ID
      ,A.TMW_Name
      ,A.TMW_LicensePlate
      ,A.TMW_TagId_Name
      ,Tag_STG.Tag_ID as TMW_TagId_lkp
	  ,Cast(Case when COALESCE(A.TMW_TagId_Name,'~')=COALESCE(B.licensePlate,'~') And COALESCE(A.TMW_TagId_Name,'~')=COALESCE(C.Tag_Name,'~') Then 'No Change'
	        Else 'Update' End as varchar(4000)) as Update_Flag
	  ,Cast(Case when COALESCE(A.TMW_TagId_Name,'~')=COALESCE(B.licensePlate,'~') And COALESCE(A.TMW_TagId_Name,'~')=COALESCE(C.Tag_Name,'~') Then 'All Fields Match Samsara'
	        Else 'Change Detected, Pushing Update' End as varchar(4000)) as Update_Comment
      ,B.name as samsara_name
      ,B.ID as samsara_id
      ,B.serial as samsara_serial
      ,B.vin as samsara_vin
      ,B.make as samsara_make
      ,B.model as samsara_model
      ,B.licensePlate as Samsara_LicensePlate
      ,C.Tag_Name as Samsara_TagId_Name
      ,C.Tag_ID  as Samsara_TagId
  FROM [IntegrationsDEV].[dbo].[Samsara_TMW_Vehicle_PSA] A
  Inner Join Vehicle_STG B on A.[TMW_Name]=B.name 
  Left Join Vehicle_Tag_STG C on  A.[TMW_Name]=C.name and COALESCE(A.[TMW_TagId_Name],'~')=COALESCE(C.Tag_Name,'~')
  Left Join Tag_STG on A.[TMW_TagId_Name]=Tag_STG.Tag_name
